entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
